00036 fsal_status_t  FSAL_lock(
00037     fsal_handle_t           * objecthandle,         /* IN */
00038     fsal_op_context_t       * p_context,            /* IN */
00039     fsal_lockparam_t        * lock_info,            /* IN */
00040     fsal_lockdesc_t         * lock_descriptor       /* OUT */
00041 )
00042 {
00043 
00044   /* sanity checks. */
00045   if ( !objecthandle || !p_context || !lock_descriptor )
00046     Return(ERR_FSAL_FAULT ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_lock);
00047   
00048   Return(ERR_FSAL_NOTSUPP ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_lock);
00049 }

00074 fsal_status_t  FSAL_unlock(
00075     fsal_lockdesc_t * lock_descriptor         /* IN/OUT */
00076 ){
00077   
00078   /* sanity checks. */
00079   if ( !lock_descriptor )
00080     Return(ERR_FSAL_FAULT ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_unlock);
